body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting SpaCare customer support. My name is Jacob Morris. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kayla. To assist you better, may I kindly ask for your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is kayla.rodriguez@example.com and my phone number is five five five-six seven eight-nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Kayla. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the data management at your Spa. Can you tell me how this issue will be addressed?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Kayla. Our technical team is currently working on improving our data management system to enhance customer experience. Is there anything else you'd like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, how soon can I expect to see improvements in the data management?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We aim to roll out the improvements within the next two weeks, Kayla. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your feedback and concerns, Kayla. We assure you that we are working diligently to address the data management issues. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
